title: Long-Form Video Editor (YouTube - Trading)
job_overview:
We’re looking for a long-term video editor to join the team behind France’s #1 trading YouTube channel.

* About the role:
– 1 video per week (20–60 min length)
– $1600/month (stable monthly salary)
– Long-term collaboration
– Topics: Trading, market analysis, personal finance

* Requirements:
– Solid understanding of trading basics (technical analysis)
– Experience with long-form YouTube editing
– Knowledge of TradingView is a big plus
– French is not required, but if you don’t speak it, you must master AI dubbing tools
